descriptionHtml:
Make better buying decisions with Savyour, Pakistan's 1st Local Discovery platform. From dining out with your friends and family to getting yourself pampered at a salon, and everything else such as; going for entertainment, buying new clothes, getting treated by a dentist and more that you do, Savyour is your local guide to find the best places to eat, shop and relax in your nearby area. Exclusive Deals & Discounts

Check-In

Wallet
Why pay full when you can avail a free discount? Never forget to save money again! Shortlist your deals before going out and get notified.

Lead the chart

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1st time in Pakistan, you will get your money back after you spend it. Shop on your favourite online stores inside the app & get up to 10% Cashback on your total bill.

User can simply earn Cashback by following these steps:
1- Visit an online Cashback Store inside Savyour.
2- Place an order on brand's website & confirm it.
3- Wait for the order completion.
4- Receive the Cashback in Savyour Wallet.
5- Withdraw the cash in your own bank account.

title: Savyour - Explore, Save, Earn

creator: Disrupt.com
descriptionHtml:
Discover, save & earn with Savyour!

We are Pakistan’s #1 local discovery platform and discount app. From dining out to spa days and buying clothes to dental treatment, Savyour is your local guide and best source of discounts in Pakistan.

See reviews and ratings of businesses around you, as well as the best discount codes, deals and offers, making it easy for you to save money and choose the best places to shop, relax and eat!

Now you can not only just save money but also make money through our new feature Cashback, simply visit any online store listed inside the app & make a purchase to earn up to 10% Cashback on your total bill.

SAVYOUR - FEATURES

Discover Great Local Businesses

• Restaurants & Cafes • Entertainment
• Apparel & Footwear
• Accessories & Fragrances
• Salon & Spa
• Health Care
• Car Maintenance
... And much more!

Earn Cashback Online

Shop on your favourite online stores inside the app & earn up to 10% cashback on your total bill.

Exclusive Deals & Discount Codes

Enjoy 10,000+ free Check-in deals & discounts offered by 500+ top brands in Karachi and save yourself a lot of money!

Check-In

Check in to a business whenever you visit and let your followers know you’re there!

Wallet

Why pay full price when you can receive a free discount or offer? Never forget to save money again! Shortlist your favourite deals and we’ll notify you so you don’t forget to use them.

Rate & Review Businesses

Check ratings and reviews of businesses before you go so you can shop, eat and relax at the best places. Don’t forget to leave your own review of a business, too! Together we can make smarter shopping decisions!

Earn money through referrals!

Invite friends to use Savyour and earn a 10% commission on the money your friends earn on Savyour. Everybody saves. Everybody wins!

Follow Friends and Like-Minded People

Follow other users to stay updated with what's trending, where your friends are going and what deals they’ve been using.

Lead the chart

Earn points on your contribution and unlock different levels.

Discover, save and earn with Savyour’s cashback and exclusive discounts. Download today!

We are always here to answer your questions, please call us at +92-334-728-728-4 or reach out via email: care@savyour.com.pk

title: Savyour: Pakistan Shopping Deals & Discounts

creator: Disrupt.com
descriptionHtml:
Shop & earn cashback from Pakistan’s first and only cashback app!

We are Pakistan’s first and only cashback app through which you can earn thousands just by shopping on your favorite online retail stores. From food, fashion, grocery, beauty and electronics, Savyour gives you the liberty of choosing from over 250 local brands, acting as your local guide to discovering the best Pakistan has to offer in terms of online shopping, along with top deals and discounts all in one place.

You can see reviews and ratings of online businesses around you in real time, and choose from rapidly updating deals and offers that are exclusive to Savyour and its affiliate brands. The more you explore, the more ways you will find to save money and be a truly smart shopper.

Not only will you be saving money, but will be able to earn back what you spend on every single transaction made. Your cashback is guaranteed on the orders you place, whether your order is small or big.

SAVYOUR - FEATURES

Discover the best online retail stores/b>

• Beauty & personal care
• Stores & grocery
• Fashion
• Mobile phones & electronics
• Books, media & stationery
• Gifts & occasions
• Auto & tires

Earn Cashback Online

Shop on your favorite online stores inside the app across multiple categories & earn up to 20% cashback on your total bill, guaranteed on every transaction.

Wallet

Receive instant notifications about cashbacks received in your wallet, along with updates on any transactions made. Save money and transfer it to your bank accounts of mobile wallets through Savyour wallet, get an overview of your available balance, cashback earned in lifetime and pending cashback. Not only this, get notified through SMS when you transfer your cashback into your bank accounts or mobile wallets instantly.

Rate & Review Businesses

Check ratings and reviews of businesses before you place your orders on your preferred brands. Don’t forget to leave your own review of a business, too! Together we can make smarter shopping decisions!

Earn money through referrals!

Invite your friends to Savyour through your referral link and receive a referral bonus of Rs. 150 on their first order of Rs. 1000+ for both you and your friends. There is no limit to how many friends you can invite, so earn unlimited bonuses and refer away!

Discover, save and earn thousands in cashbacks with Savyour, with easy withdrawal and unlimited referral bonuses. Why wait, become a smart shopper today!

Download Savyour now.

We are always here to answer your questions, please call us at +92-334-728-728-4 or reach out via email: care@savyour.com

title:

13.0.0

creator: Disrupt.com
descriptionHtml:
Transform every purchase into a reward with savyour, your ultimate savings companion.
With savyour, every time you shop, your wallet gets heavier, not lighter.


Welcome to Savyour, where every tap leads to more savings:
Now you can shop your favorite brands across fashion, electronics, beauty and more, while we help you save with discounts, coupons and cashbacks.


Your shopping & savings starts with us:
With savyour, discover 400+ local & international brands. It's not just shopping; it's an experience in a world of deals, discounts, coupons and cashbacks.


Coupons, Discounts and Savings, exclusive for you:
With savyour, savings on shopping is not just easy but also fun. With all sorts of discounts, coupons and cashbacks, it’ll be like a game in which you earn real money instead of points.


Cashback on Every Purchase - Big or Small:
Every purchase, big or small, has its reward. We guarantee cashback on every transaction you make. Watch your savings grow with each tap, turning every buy into a smart financial decision.


Shop Smart. Save Smarter:
Explore categories that cater to every need and desire:
Beauty & Personal Care
Fashion Trends
Electronics & Gadgets


The savyour wallet - more than just savings:
Get real-time cashback notifications directly in your savyour wallet. Enjoy the flexibility to transfer your savings to your personal bank or mobile wallet effortlessly. It’s transparent, it’s instant – it’s your financial companion.


Earn more with Referrals:
Spread the joy of smart shopping! Invite friends and earn an extra bonus forr each successful referral. The more you share, the more you earn!


Join the savyour Revolution:
Ready to redefine your shopping experience? Download Savyour now and step into a world where every purchase is rewarding. Smart shopping is just a click away!




We're Here for You
Questions or feedback? Reach out to us at care@savyour.com and let's make your shopping experience even better.
